wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Stanley Farrell (born 23 September 1932) is a British hurdler. He competed in the men's 400 metres hurdles at the 1956 Summer Olympics. He represented England in the 440 yards hurdles at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales.

response: Thomas or Tom Farrell may refer to:
*Tom Farrell (hurdler) (born 1932), British hurdler and middle-distance runner
*Tom Farrell (rugby union) (born 1993), Irish rugby union player
*Tom Farrell (Gimme Gimme Gimme), a fictional character in Gimme Gimme Gimme
